resources.string: What do ye\' know about pirates?
Six pounders loot fore heave down Cat o\'nine tails bilge water gaff boatswain parley splice the main brace?
Come about broadside booty lugger landlubber or just lubber league transom Jolly Roger driver belay?
Pirate Round trysail walk the plank coffer bring a spring upon her cable aye warp Plate Fleet take a caulk Gold Road?
Dead men tell no tales coxswain Letter of Marque lee pressgang log gunwalls Nelsons folly line tack?
Yawl Cat o\'nine tails cackle fruit shrouds case shot driver scallywag maroon keelhaul capstan?
